page.title: 13Gospel Oak.
page.content: This area is mainly residential. There are four areas. The largest is the Wednesbury Oak estate, which is a group of private houses off{Wednesbury {Oak Road. }The smaller areas are {Swallowdale, Rocket Pool}and the most recent {Burberry Grange. }In 1985, Burberry Grange is still being built, although the first phase is already occupied. At the corner of Wednesbury Oak Road and Bilston Road is the{Gospel Oak {Tavern,}still known locally by its old name of{Mother Shipton's.}There is a legend that the pub is still haunted by the ghost of{Mother Shipton}who wanders around calling her dog. There are people who claim to have photographed it, although no photographs have been found.
